mapper.delete: DELETE from COMTNADBK where EMPLYR_ID = #{emplyrId} AND NCRD_ID = #{ncrdId} AND ADBK_ID = #{adbkId}
mapper.select:
SELECT ADBK_ID, ADBK_NM, OTHBC_SCOPE, USE_AT, WRTER_ID, TRGET_ORGNZT_ID, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNADBKMANAGE WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' AND( OTHBC_SCOPE = '회사 ' OR WRTER_ID = #{wrterId} OR (OTHBC_SCOPE = '부서' AND TRGET_ORGNZT_ID = #{trgetOrgnztId}) )
AND ADBK_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND OTHBC_SCOPE LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND WRTER_ID LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
ORDER BY ADBK_NM LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(ADBK_ID) FROM COMTNADBKMANAGE WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' AND (OTHBC_SCOPE = '회사' OR WRTER_ID = #{wrterId} OR (OTHBC_SCOPE = '부서' AND TRGET_ORGNZT_ID = #{trgetOrgnztId}) )
AND ADBK_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND OTHBC_SCOPE LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND WRTER_ID LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')

SELECT EMPLYR_ID, USER_NM, EMAIL_ADRES, concat(AREA_NO,'-',HOUSE_MIDDLE_TELNO,'-',HOUSE_END_TELNO) HOUSE_TELNO, MBTLNUM, OFFM_TELNO, FXNUM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE USER_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%') UNION SELECT ENTRPRS_MBER_ID AS EMPLYR_ID, CMPNY_NM AS USER_NM, APPLCNT_EMAIL_ADRES AS EMAIL_ADRES, '' AS HOUSE_TELNO, '' AS MBTLNUM, concat(AREA_NO,'-',ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO,'-',ENTRPRS_END_TELNO) OFFM_TELNO, FXNUM FROM COMTNENTRPRSMBER WHERE CMPNY_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%') UNION SELECT MBER_ID AS EMPLYR_ID, MBER_NM AS USER_NM, MBER_EMAIL_ADRES AS EMAIL_ADRES, concat(AREA_NO,'-',MIDDLE_TELNO,'-',END_TELNO) HOUSE_TELNO, MBTLNUM, '' AS OFFM_TELNO, MBER_FXNUM AS FXNUM FROM COMTNGNRLMBER WHERE MBER_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
ORDER BY USER_NM LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT NCRD_ID, NM, EMAIL_ADRES, TELNO, MBTLNUM FROM COMTNNCRD WHERE 1=1 AND NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
ORDER BY NM LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT ADBK_CONSTNT_ID As adbk_UserId, ADBK_ID As adbkId, EMPLYR_ID As emplyrId, NCRD_ID As ncrdId, NM As nm, EMAIL_ADRES As emailAdres, HOUSE_TELNO As homeTelno, MBTLNUM As moblphonNo, OFFM_TELNO As offmTelno, FXNUM As fxnum FROM COMTNADBK WHERE ADBK_ID = #{adbkId}

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(USER_NM) FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE USER_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%') ) + ( SELECT COUNT(CMPNY_NM) FROM COMTNENTRPRSMBER WHERE CMPNY_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%') ) + ( SELECT COUNT(MBER_NM) FROM COMTNGNRLMBER WHERE MBER_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%') ) as cnt
SELECT COUNT(NM) FROM COMTNNCRD WHERE 1=1 AND NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
SELECT ADBK_ID, ADBK_NM, OTHBC_SCOPE, USE_AT, WRTER_ID FROM COMTNADBKMANAGE WHERE ADBK_ID = #{adbkId}

SELECT EMPLYR_ID, USER_NM, EMAIL_ADRES, concat(AREA_NO,'-',HOUSE_MIDDLE_TELNO,'-',HOUSE_END_TELNO) HOUSE_TELNO, MBTLNUM, OFFM_TELNO, FXNUM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #{id} UNION SELECT ENTRPRS_MBER_ID AS EMPLYR_ID, CMPNY_NM AS USER_NM, APPLCNT_EMAIL_ADRES AS EMAIL_ADRES, '' AS HOUSE_TELNO, '' AS MBTLNUM, concat(AREA_NO,'-',ENTRPRS_MIDDLE_TELNO,'-',ENTRPRS_END_TELNO) OFFM_TELNO, FXNUM FROM COMTNENTRPRSMBER WHERE ENTRPRS_MBER_ID = #{id} UNION SELECT MBER_ID AS EMPLYR_ID, MBER_NM AS USER_NM, MBER_EMAIL_ADRES AS EMAIL_ADRES, concat(AREA_NO,'-',MIDDLE_TELNO,'-',END_TELNO) HOUSE_TELNO, MBTLNUM, '' AS OFFM_TELNO, MBER_FXNUM AS FXNUM FROM COMTNGNRLMBER WHERE MBER_ID = #{id}
SELECT NCRD_ID, NM, EMAIL_ADRES, TELNO, MBTLNUM FROM COMTNNCRD WHERE NCRD_ID = #{id}
